publisher.value: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG

description.value: This extension is used when there are multiple interpretation values for a single Observation Resource. The first interpretation for this observation is the interpretation element and any additional interpretations for this observation will go here.

formal.value: This extension is used when there are multiple interpretation values for a single Observation Resource. The first interpretation for this observation is the interpretation element and any additional interpretations for this observation will go here.
